page.title: 13CUSTOMS IN CULWORTH EVENTS 1
page.content: {MAY DAY}--Celebrations are as near to the beginning of May as possible and held at school with Maypole and Country Dancing and crowning. {CHURCH/VILLAGE FETE}--This alternates, always in summer,one year for Church Funds,one year for Village.There are cream teas,cake stalls,white elephant,tombola and games. {PIG ROAST}Another Summer event when local people,visitors and friends,roast a pig,serve and eat it with fresh salad. Dancing to a live band takes place in open barns long into the night.Any money raised is put towards Residents Association Funds.
